location.zh-cn: 门洛帕克 (加利福尼亚州)

description.zh-cn: 一家由唐·瓦伦丁于1972年创立的美国风险投资公司，在美国、印度、中国大陆、以色列设有办事处。曾投资众多知名科技企业。
description.en: An American venture capital firm founded by Don Valentine in 1972, with offices in the United States, India, mainland China, and Israel. It has invested in numerous well-known technology companies.

description.zh-cn: 美国风险投资家，红杉资本的创始人。
description.en: American venture capitalist, founder of Sequoia Capital.

nodes.id: 门洛帕克 (加利福尼亚州)

zh-cn: 门洛帕克 (加利福尼亚州)

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加利福尼亚州圣马特奥县的一座城市，是红杉资本的创立地。
description.en: A city in San Mateo County, California, United States, and the founding location of Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本的合伙人之一，在1990年代中期与迈克尔·莫里茨一起从创始人唐·瓦伦丁手中接管了公司。
description.en: A partner at Sequoia Capital who, along with Michael Moritz, took over the firm from founder Don Valentine in the mid-1990s.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本的合伙人之一，在1990年代中期与道格·莱昂内一起从创始人唐·瓦伦丁手中接管了公司。
description.en: A partner at Sequoia Capital who, along with Doug Leone, took over the firm from founder Don Valentine in the mid-1990s.

description.zh-cn: 原为红杉资本的中国附属公司，由张帆和沈南鹏于2005年联合创立。2023年6月从红杉资本分拆成为独立实体，英文名改为HongShan。
description.en: Formerly the Chinese affiliate of Sequoia Capital, co-founded by Zhang Fan and Neil Shen in 2005. In June 2023, it spun off from Sequoia Capital to become an independent entity, changing its English name to HongShan.

description.zh-cn: 红杉中国的创始及执行合伙人，曾任携程网总裁兼CFO。被中国媒体描述为中国最著名的风险投资家之一。
description.en: Founding and Managing Partner of Sequoia China, former President and CFO of Ctrip. Described by Chinese media as one of the country's most famous venture capitalists.

description.zh-cn: 红杉中国的创始合伙人之一，曾任德丰杰全球基金董事。被中国媒体描述为中国最著名的风险投资家之一。
description.en: One of the founding partners of Sequoia China, former director of Draper Fisher Jurvetson's global fund. Described by Chinese media as one of the country's most famous venture capitalists.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国风险投资公司。张帆在创立红杉中国前曾是其全球基金的董事。
description.en: An American venture capital firm. Zhang Fan was a director of its global fund before co-founding Sequoia China.

description.zh-cn: 中国在线旅游服务公司。沈南鹏在创立红杉中国前曾是其总裁兼CFO。
description.en: A Chinese online travel services company. Neil Shen was its President and CFO before co-founding Sequoia China.

description.zh-cn: 一家印度风险投资公司，于2006年被红杉资本收购，并更名为红杉资本印度公司。
description.en: An Indian venture capital firm that was acquired by Sequoia Capital in 2006 and renamed Sequoia Capital India.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本在印度的分支机构，由收购Westbridge Capital Partners后更名而来。
description.en: The Indian arm of Sequoia Capital, formed after the acquisition and renaming of Westbridge Capital Partners.

description.zh-cn: 于2020年被红杉资本聘用，以领导其在英国伦敦设立的第一家欧洲办事处。
description.en: Hired by Sequoia Capital in 2020 to lead its first European office in London, UK.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国跨国科技公司，是红杉资本投资的知名企业之一。
description.en: An American multinational technology company, one of the notable companies invested in by Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国跨国科技公司，专注于在线广告技术、搜索、云计算、软件和硬件。是红杉资本投资的知名企业之一。
description.en: An American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, search, cloud computing, software, and hardware. It is one of the notable companies invested in by Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 一个美国的视频分享网站，是红杉资本投资的知名企业之一。
description.en: An American video-sharing website, one of the notable companies invested in by Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国公司，在全球范围内运营在线支付系统，是红杉资本投资的知名企业之一。
description.en: An American company operating a worldwide online payments system, one of the notable companies invested in by Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国跨国科技集团，是红杉资本投资的知名企业之一。
description.en: An American multinational technology conglomerate, one of the notable companies invested in by Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国跨国计算机技术公司，是红杉资本投资的知名企业之一。
description.en: An American multinational computer technology corporation, one of the notable companies invested in by Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 一家在线快时尚零售商，是红杉资本投资的知名企业之一。
description.en: An online fast fashion retailer, one of the notable companies invested in by Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国视频游戏公司，是红杉资本投资的知名企业之一。
description.en: An American video game company, one of the notable companies invested in by Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国视频游戏和家用电脑公司，是红杉资本投资的知名企业之一。
description.en: An American video game and home computer company, one of the notable companies invested in by Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 一款美国的免费即时通讯应用程序，是红杉资本投资的知名企业之一。
description.en: An American freeware, cross-platform messaging and Voice over IP service, one of the notable companies invested in by Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 一个面向商业和就业的在线服务网站，是红杉资本投资的知名企业之一。
description.en: An American business and employment-oriented online service, one of the notable companies invested in by Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本的关键人物之一。
description.en: One of the key people at Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 唐·瓦伦丁于1972年在加利福尼亚州门洛帕克创立了红杉资本。
description.en: Don Valentine founded Sequoia Capital in 1972 in Menlo Park, California.

description.zh-cn: 在1990年代中期，唐·瓦伦丁将红杉资本的控制权交给了道格·莱昂内和迈克尔·莫里茨。
description.en: In the mid-1990s, Don Valentine handed over control of Sequoia Capital to Doug Leone and Michael Moritz.

description.zh-cn: 在1990年代中期，唐·瓦伦丁将红杉资本的控制权交给了道格·莱昂内和迈克尔·莫里茨。
description.en: In the mid-1990s, Don Valentine handed over control of Sequoia Capital to Doug Leone and Michael Moritz.

description.zh-cn: 道格·莱昂内是红杉资本的关键人物，并在1990年代中期接管了公司。
description.en: Doug Leone is a key person at Sequoia Capital and took over the firm in the mid-1990s.

description.zh-cn: 迈克尔·莫里茨是红杉资本的关键人物，并在1990年代中期接管了公司。
description.en: Michael Moritz is a key person at Sequoia Capital and took over the firm in the mid-1990s.

description.zh-cn: 吉姆·哥兹是红杉资本的关键人物之一。
description.en: Jim Goetz is listed as one of the key people at Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 2005年9月，张帆与沈南鹏和红杉资本共同创立了红杉资本中国基金。
description.en: In September 2005, Zhang Fan co-founded Sequoia Capital China Fund with Neil Shen and Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 2005年9月，沈南鹏与张帆和红杉资本共同创立了红杉资本中国基金。
description.en: In September 2005, Neil Shen co-founded Sequoia Capital China Fund with Zhang Fan and Sequoia Capital.

description.zh-cn: 2005年9月，红杉资本与张帆和沈南鹏共同创立了红杉资本中国基金。
description.en: In September 2005, Sequoia Capital co-founded Sequoia Capital China Fund with Zhang Fan and Neil Shen.

description.zh-cn: 红杉中国作为红杉资本的附属公司成立，直到2023年6月分拆为止。
description.en: Sequoia China was established as an affiliate of Sequoia Capital and remained so until the spin-off in June 2023.

description.zh-cn: 在创立红杉中国之前，张帆是德丰杰全球基金的董事。
description.en: Before co-founding Sequoia China, Zhang Fan was a director of Draper Fisher Jurvetson's global fund.

description.zh-cn: 在创立红杉中国之前，沈南鹏是携程网的总裁兼CFO。
description.en: Before co-founding Sequoia China, Neil Shen was the President and CFO of Ctrip.

description.zh-cn: 沈南鹏是红杉中国的领导者。
description.en: Neil Shen leads Sequoia China.

description.zh-cn: 2006年，红杉资本收购了印度风险投资公司Westbridge Capital Partners。
description.en: In 2006, Sequoia Capital acquired the Indian venture capital firm Westbridge Capital Partners.

description.zh-cn: 被红杉资本收购后，Westbridge Capital Partners更名为红杉资本印度公司。
description.en: After being acquired by Sequoia Capital, Westbridge Capital Partners was renamed Sequoia Capital India.

description.zh-cn: 2020年，红杉资本聘请Luciana Lixandru领导其在伦敦设立的第一家欧洲办事处。
description.en: In 2020, Sequoia Capital hired Luciana Lixandru to lead its first European office in London.

description.zh-cn: 2023年6月，红杉资本宣布将其中国业务分拆，使红杉中国成为一个完全独立的实体。
description.en: In June 2023, Sequoia Capital announced the spin-off of its China business, making Sequoia China a completely independent entity.

description.zh-cn: 在从红杉资本分拆后，红杉中国将其英文名改为“HongShan”。
description.en: After spinning off from Sequoia Capital, Sequoia China changed its English name to 'HongShan'.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本投资了苹果公司。
description.en: Sequoia Capital invested in Apple Inc.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本投资了Google。
description.en: Sequoia Capital invested in Google.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本投资了YouTube。
description.en: Sequoia Capital invested in YouTube.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本投资了PayPal。
description.en: Sequoia Capital invested in PayPal.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本投资了思科系统。
description.en: Sequoia Capital invested in Cisco Systems.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本投资了甲骨文公司。
description.en: Sequoia Capital invested in Oracle Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本投资了SHEIN。
description.en: Sequoia Capital invested in SHEIN.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本投资了Electronic Arts。
description.en: Sequoia Capital invested in Electronic Arts.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本投资了Atari。
description.en: Sequoia Capital invested in Atari.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本投资了WhatsApp。
description.en: Sequoia Capital invested in WhatsApp.

description.zh-cn: 红杉资本投资了领英。
description.en: Sequoia Capital invested in LinkedIn.
